pages.text: $(italic)The problem with hoppers is that, on the one hand, they are not only slow, but also poorly suited for larger farms due to their non-existent range.$(br2)With a bit of application of blue pigment, all items in a large radius around the crate can easily be brought to safety.

pages.title: Pedestal Recipe
pages.text: Black Hole Chests have a radius of 12 blocks. You can disable them by placing a block on top. It offers filters to specify which items it should accept.
